Portal 2 is beyond any doubt a "Work of art".  If there's only one game you play ever it should be portal 2. (Ideally portal 1 first). This puzzle game fundamentally changers how you see the world and improves your problem solving skills while at the same time being the most entertaining and emotional experience you will ever find in a game.
Loved beating this game and grinding the achievements with friends. Great game to pick up and play casually with a friend.

Nothing to say about this that hasn't already been said. It's old but I played it for the first time about a year ago and loved it. It doesn't feel old and I laughed so much playing this game. The story in the second game in my opinion is the best but I loved the puzzles in both games. 

Anyway yes you should get this game it will make you feel so smart.

I would rate a 9/10. the graphics are amazing, valve hired amazing voice actors, and I love that you can make your own test chambers. the humor is on point and the puzzles are just the right amount of difficult. the boss at the end is amazing and basically, this game is one of the best. I do have one gripe, and that's that the Mac version won't work for my version of computer. I had to use a family member's computer to play, but that's my only gripe. I have found a few bugs, though. this game is amazing, even without ever playing the first one.

Portal 2 is a lot of fun. That's all I can say about it.
Custom Maps in this game are a ton of fun, whether it's just standard "Portal" gameplay, or even racing.
The racing modes are a ton of fun, with the selection of routes and traps on the maps that I've played.
Anyways, that's about it.

~ If you got this far, you're a legend.
Thanks for reading my review of Portal 2!
this is THE best game on steam!
sim bom comprem

Evet, kısa sürüyor ama kendi bölümünde gördüğüm en iyi hikaye-puzzle oyunlarından biri. Ayrıca 2 kişilik multiplayer oynama özelliği de singleplayer'da hikayeyi bitirse de oyunu arkadaşlarıyla oynamak isteyenler için oldukça güzel.. Fiyat açısından değer ama bana sorarsanız indirimi bekleyebilirsiniz(Sıklılkla indirime giren bir oyun kendisi). Valve önceki bölümün devamı niteliğinde olan bu oyun için bayağı emek harcamış. Kesinlikle tavsiye ederim
